resources.string: Routines
Welcome!

You installed Routines because:



 ✏ You want to set new or change your habits 
 ✏ You want to change the pace of your life.
 ✏ You want to drive a change within yourself.
 ✏ Perhaps you are just curious about yourself.


 Is this you?

Great! Lets get started by establishing the most important task of the day:

 The Morning Planner.


Are you ready?
Yes
Are you ready?
I\'m ready

Think of Routines as a tool to help you manage your habits. It is not just a habit tracker but a tool that can help you change if you really want it. Remember this tip well: \n Do not rely on this app, or any other app for that manner, to change things for you. You must drive your own change. \n
To use this app effectively, it is important
All majestic trees are born from tiny little seeds.
By getting started, you have picked up your seed and shovel.
Now lets plant that seed.
The first and most important task of the day is proper planning. Lets try it.\n (Check your Notifications)
You have just watered your new seed. Do not neglect it or it will never grow.
I wake up at:
I sleep at:
Pick:
"Great! Your first daily task, the most important task, is to plan your day. Let's do a test run. "
We made an oopsy! Try again?
